"Every great developer you know, got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it." - Patrick McKenzie

About Me

Hello, I am Robert. A resourceful front-end engineer with a passion for designing, developing, implementing software and web app projects. A Self-motivated autodidact with an ambitious goal of becoming a full-stack polyglot ninja. Ability to be a proactive, accountable, and self-directed team member with a great desire for constructive criticism and mentor-ship. The self-taught path has equipped me with the ability to complete complex challenges, problems and learn new languages quickly. You will not find someone with more passion for technology, learning and writing beautifully structured code.
